realfooding.desc: Transforming a health movement into one of the most impactful F&B brands.

hubrock.desc: Product design and development of an innovative platform for collaboration between companies based on challenges. A project made  for the Chamber of Commerce.

shukran.desc: Rebranding, content strategy and brand positioning for one of the most promising up-and-coming brands in the Spanish foodtech industry.

myrealfood.desc: UX/UI design of the leading product scanning and healthy recipes app, with more than 2 million monthly active users. Design and launch strategy for the paid plan.
